statements: DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 101 AND customer_id = 201
DELETE FROM CustomerScores WHERE customer_id = 5 AND score > 3;
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 123 AND satisfaction_score < 3;
DELETE FROM CustomerScores WHERE feedback_id = 456 AND customer_id = 789;
DELETE FROM feedbacks WHERE feedback_id = 1 AND satisfaction_score < 3;
DELETE FROM scores WHERE score_value >= 4 AND feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM feedbacks WHERE customer_id = 5);
DELETE FROM feedback_summary WHERE customer_id = 201 AND category_id = 3;
